Row.Text: -Adds Robert Borden as a leader of Canada. [NEWLINE]-Compatible with Peterbro's Civilization VI, and other leaders and civilizations created by Peterbro. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]-Robert Borden Trait/Military Service Act: All units receive +5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when in a Joint War. Corps and Armies receive an additional +5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when formed. [NEWLINE]-Robert Borden Agenda/Imperial War Cabinet: Likes civilizations who honor their alliances and join him in wars. Dislikes civilizations who refuse to join wars or betray their allies. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]-TSL support for YnAMP: Giant Earth, and YnAMP: Greatest Earth Map. [NEWLINE]-Historic information can be found on Wikipedia. Robert Borden served as Prime Minister of Canada during World War I and implemented the controversial Military Service Act of 1917, introducing conscription to support the war effort.
